name: bnj1238
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: sylbi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1), wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)), wrex(s0, c0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)), wrex(s0, c0, w1))

body.origin: |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)), wrex(s0, c0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, w1))
-| wb(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wa(w1, w2)))

comment: First-order logic and set theory. (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)
